#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t,n,d,i,s;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t>0){
		cin>>n;
		s=0;
		int count=0;
		int a[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>a[i]; 
			s=s+a[i];
		}
		if(s%n==0){
			d=s/n;
			for(i=0;i<n;i++){
				if(a[i]<d){
					while(a[i]!=d){
						a[i]++;
						count++;
					}
				}
				else if(a[i]>d){
				
				while(a[i]!=d){
					a[i]--;
					count++;
				}
			}
			}
			printf("%d\n",count);
		}
		else
		printf("-1\n");
		
		
		
		
		
		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
